original_text: Implement an algorithm that defaults to FIFO but dynamically switches to LIFO when it reduces tax liability by at least 5%, citing IRS Pub 551 in inline comments, logs the selected strategy per wallet-year in `tax_lot_strategy`, and operates under the `autoLotV2` feature flag (enabled by default in staging and disabled in production pending audit approval).
